about.subtitle: Get to know...
about.title: About Me
about.description: Full-stack web and mobile developer, always seeking to learn and expand my skills. Enthusiastic and passionate about the world of development, I am a developer who immerses myself with fervor in the challenges and opportunities offered by the field of computing. My passion for programming goes far beyond simple technical skills, it is a true expression of my creativity and my commitment to innovation...
about.textSelling: If you are looking for a creative and passionate web developer, capable of working in a team to create custom solutions, do not hesitate to contact me. I am always looking for new challenges and I look forward to collaborating with you to realize your most ambitious web projects.

framing.title: Project Framing
framing.desc1: Definition of functional and technical requirements.
framing.desc2: Analysis and recommendation of technological tools required for efficient production.

design.title: Project Design
design.desc2: Automation of web data collection via scraping

development.title: Development
development.desc1: Design and integration of UI components
development.desc2: Integration of a login system via API in a front/back architecture

deployment.title: Deployment and Maintenance
deployment.desc1: Quality control, maintenance and performance improvement.
deployment.desc2: Design and implementation of a complete infrastructure for continuous integration and deployment (CI/CD).

ticketUp.title: TicketUp: Event Management and Ticket Selling Platform.
ticketUp.description: TicketUp is a comprehensive event management and ticket sales platform, consisting of three interconnected modules: Mobile Application, Web Administration Center (Organizers & Admins) and Central API (Secure Backend)

mySchool.title: MySchool: Complete School Management Application.
mySchool.description: The platform aims to make the high school education system easy. Facilitate communication, management, and improve the way of transmitting knowledge.

ebookShare.title: E-bookShare: A way to share my favorite e-book to everyone.
ebookShare.description: e-BookShare is a web and mobile application that facilitates the sharing, discovery and borrowing of digital books, encouraging social reading and mutual aid between enthusiasts.

footer.title: Portfolio
footer.description: Full-stack web & mobile developer with 3+ years of experience, expert in PHP, JavaScript/TypeScript and frameworks React, Angular, Node.js. Specialized in databases, design systems and high-performance web architectures. Autonomous, rigorous and committed in agile environments.
